special_text:
When Rozalia dies, you may discard a card. If you do, exile her, then you may cast Sapphire, Aspiring Lich as long as she remains exiled.
[+1]: Until end of turn, Rozalia becomes a 4/4 Elf Warrior creature with indestructible and haste. [i](She doesn't lose loyalty while not a planeswalker.)[/i]
[-2]: Exile target artifact, enchantment, or card in a graveyard.
When Sapphire dies, you may discard a card. If you do, exile her, then you may cast Rozalia, Lichbane as long as she remains exiled.
[+1]: You may return a creature card from your graveyard to your hand, then each player discards a card.
